name: slack-submit-for-review-app
description: A comprehensive Slack application for content review workflows with Google Sheets integration

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Slack Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-)

SLACK_APP_TOKEN.description: Your Slack App-Level Token (starts with xapp-)

CHANNEL_ID.description: Target Slack channel ID (alternative to CHANNEL_NAME)

GOOGLE_SHEET_ID.description: Google Sheet ID (optional, for Google Sheets integration)

GOOGLE_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY.description: Google Service Account JSON key (optional, for Google Sheets integration)
